name: Arcadia, Exhibition Space of Climate and Earth
name_original: Arcadia, Exhibition Space of Climate and Earth
description:
Arcadia, Exhibition Space of Cliamte and Earth is an experimental graphic project that responds to the climate crisis and to the traditional discourse that surrounds it. Starting from the fact that are the unsustainable and anthropocentric attitudes what have brought us to this point, the project appropriates and decontextualizes the language of utilitarian signaling in order to alarm, question and articulate a conversation about the problem.

(This digital installation is a prototype)
